summary.para: Retrieves the number of progress items in the collection.

param.name: Count
param.para: Number of progress items in the collection.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

summary.para: Retrieves the list of progress items from the collection.

param.name: NewEnum
param.para: An interface that contains a collection of the progress items contained in the collection.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

description.para: Failed to allocate the required memory.

remarks.para: This property returns the same results as the property and is meant for use by C/C++ applications.

summary.para: Retrieves the specified progress item from the collection.

param.name: Index
param.para: Zero-based index number corresponding to a progress item in the collection.

param.name: item
param.para: An interface associated with the specified index value.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

description.para: Failed to allocate the required memory.
One or more arguments are not valid.

remarks.para: To enumerate all progress items, call the method.

summary.para: Retrieves the list of progress items from the collection.

param.name: NewEnum
param.para: An IEnumVariant interface that you use to enumerate the progress items contained within the collection. Each item of the enumeration is a VARIANT whose type is VT_DISPATCH. Query the pdispVal member to retrieve the interface.

returns.para: S_OK is returned when the number of requested elements (celt) are returned successfully or the number of returned items (pceltFetched) is less than the number of requested elements. The celt and pceltFetched parameters are defined by IEnumVariant.
Other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

description.para: Failed to allocate the required memory.

remarks.para: The enumeration is a snapshot of the progress items contained in the collection at the time of the call.
To retrieve a single item, see the property.

summary.para: Retrieves a progress item based on the specified block number.

param.name: block
param.para: Block number of the progress item to retrieve. The method returns the progress item if the block number is in the first and last block range of the item.

param.name: item
param.para: An interface associated with the specified block number.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

description.para: Failed to allocate the required memory.
One or more arguments are not valid.

summary.para: Retrieves a progress item based on the specified file name.

param.name: description
param.para: String that contains the file name of the progress item to retrieve. The method returns the progress item if this string matches the value for item's description property.

param.name: item
param.para: An interface of the progress item associated with the specified file name.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

description.para: Failed to allocate the required memory.
One or more arguments are not valid.

summary.para: Use this interface to enumerate the progress items in a result image. A progress item represents a segment of the result image.
To get this interface, call the method.

remarks.para: This is a ProgressItems object in script.
